title: How Do You Solve A Problem Like Crypto Company Culture?
description: Company culture is under the microscope like never before, while there is still a lack of concrete regulation to tame the volatile sector. As investors worry about whether the industry can shake off recent setbacks, Financial News meets Sendi Young, the European chief of digital assets giant Ripple, for an insider's take.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
